statements: SELECT * FROM social_media_activity;
SELECT post_content, author_name, likes_count FROM social_media_activity WHERE likes_count > 100;
SELECT post_id, author_name, post_date FROM social_media_activity WHERE post_date >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT author_name, likes_count FROM social_media_activity WHERE author_name LIKE 'John%';
SELECT post_id, post_content, likes_count FROM social_media_activity ORDER BY likes_count DESC;
SELECT post_id, post_content, post_date, author_name, likes_count FROM social_media_activity WHERE likes_count > 100 ORDER BY post_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT post_id, author_name, likes_count FROM social_media_activity WHERE author_name LIKE 'John%' ORDER BY likes_count ASC;
SELECT post_id, post_content FROM social_media_activity WHERE post_id IN (1, 3, 5) OR likes_count < 50;
SELECT author_name, COUNT(*) AS post_count FROM social_media_activity GROUP BY author_name HAVING post_count > 2 ORDER BY post_count DESC;
SELECT author_name, MAX(likes_count) AS max_likes FROM social_media_activity GROUP BY author_name HAVING max_likes > 500 ORDER BY max_likes DESC;
SELECT * FROM SocialMediaPosts;
SELECT post_author, post_content FROM SocialMediaPosts WHERE post_author = 'John Doe';
SELECT post_id, post_timestamp, post_content FROM SocialMediaPosts WHERE post_timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY post_timestamp DESC;
SELECT post_id, COUNT(interaction_id) AS total_interactions FROM PostInteractions GROUP BY post_id HAVING total_interactions > 5;
SELECT post_author, interaction_type, interaction_timestamp FROM SocialMediaPosts JOIN PostInteractions ON SocialMediaPosts.post_id = PostInteractions.post_id ORDER BY interaction_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM SocialMediaPosts;
SELECT post_content, post_author FROM SocialMediaPosts WHERE post_author = 'John Doe';
SELECT post_content, post_timestamp FROM SocialMediaPosts ORDER BY post_timestamp DESC;
SELECT post_author, COUNT(*) AS total_posts FROM SocialMediaPosts GROUP BY post_author HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;

SELECT p.post_content, pi.interaction_type, pi.interaction_timestamp FROM SocialMediaPosts p JOIN PostInteractions pi ON p.post_id = pi.post_id WHERE pi.interaction_timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY pi.interaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM research_proposal;
SELECT title, author FROM research_proposal ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT author, title FROM research_proposal WHERE posted_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, activity_type, activity_date FROM social_media_activity WHERE likes >= 100 ORDER BY activity_date ASC;
SELECT study_name, researcher, start_date, end_date FROM social_science_study WHERE end_date > '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM research_proposal;
SELECT id, title, author FROM research_proposal WHERE posted_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT author, title FROM research_proposal WHERE author LIKE 'John%';
SELECT study_name, researcher, start_date FROM social_science_study ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT activity_id, activity_type, activity_date FROM social_media_activity WHERE likes > 100 ORDER BY activity_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM social_media_users;
SELECT username, full_name FROM social_media_users WHERE social_media_platform = 'Instagram';
SELECT * FROM social_media_posts ORDER BY post_date DESC;
SELECT email FROM social_media_users WHERE username = 'johndoe';
SELECT post_content, likes_count, post_date FROM social_media_posts WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM social_media_users WHERE username LIKE 'john%' ORDER BY full_name DESC;
SELECT username, full_name, email FROM social_media_users WHERE social_media_platform = 'Twitter';
SELECT user_id, post_date, likes_count FROM social_media_posts WHERE likes_count >= 100 ORDER BY post_date DESC;
SELECT post_id, post_content, likes_count FROM social_media_posts WHERE likes_count < 10 AND post_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT comment_id, comment_content, comment_date FROM social_media_comments WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM SocialMediaUsers ORDER BY followers_count DESC, following_count ASC
SELECT post_text, post_date FROM Posts WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT user_id, count(*) AS total_likes FROM Likes GROUP BY user_id
SELECT trend_name, trend_description FROM Trends WHERE trend_activity_count > 100 ORDER BY trend_activity_count DESC
SELECT username, followers_count FROM SocialMediaUsers WHERE followers_count > following_count
SELECT * FROM SocialMediaUsers ORDER BY followers_count DESC, username ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT post_id, post_text, post_date FROM Posts WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY post_date DESC
SELECT username, followers_count, following_count FROM SocialMediaUsers WHERE followers_count > 1000 AND following_count < 500 ORDER BY followers_count DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT comment_text FROM Comments WHERE post_id = 3 ORDER BY comment_id ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT trend_name, trend_description, trend_activity_count FROM Trends WHERE trend_activity_count > 500 ORDER BY trend_activity_count DESC LIMIT 5
